card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Maneuver: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Maneuver: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.name: Battle Tested
card.property: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (+4 if you spot a card stacked on a [Dwarven] condition).

card.name: Calculated Risk
card.property: Spot a Dwarf and add a threat to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Dark Ways
card.property: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to heal a Dwarf twice and take a [Dwarven] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. While you have initiative, Gimli is strength +2.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Response: if a [Dwarven] condition is about to be discarded by an opponent, exert a Dwarf or discard a [Dwarven] card from hand to prevent that.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Bearer must be Gimli. Response: If you have initiative and Gimli is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Bearer must be a dwarf. While you can spot a threat, bearer is damage +1. While you can spot 2 threats, bearer is strength +1. While you can spot 3 threats, the fellowship archery total is +1.

card.name: Loyalty Unshaken
card.property: When you play this condition, you may stack 2 cards from hand here and draw a card for each [Dwarven] card you stack. Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2. Also, make that Dwarf damage +2 for each [Dwarven] card stacked on this condition. Discard this condition.

card.name: Out of Darkness
card.property: Make a Dwarf strength +2. You may also exert that Dwarf to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Preparations
card.property: Regroup: Exert a Dwarf companion to stack a card from your discard pile here. Skirmish: Wound a minion skirmishing a Dwarf once for each [Dwarven] card stacked here. Discard this condition.

card.name: Reckless Pride
card.property: Bearer must be a [Dwarven] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Reckless Pride.' Regroup: Discard this condition to draw 4 cards.

card.name: Slaked Thirsts
card.property: Choose one: Spot a Dwarf to draw a card; or, if this card is stacked on a [Dwarven] condition, spot a Dwarf companion and discard this event to exert a minion twice.

card.name: Ancient Blade
card.property: Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Ancient Blade.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and reconcile your hand.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: While skirmishing a fierce minion, Arwen is strength +3.

card.name: Asfaloth
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to make each minion skirmishing her strength -2.

card.name: Bow of the Galadhrim
card.property: Bearer must be Legolas. Each time you play an [Elven] skirmish event during a skirmish involving Legolas, you may heal him.

card.name: Careful Study
card.property: Spot an Elf and discard 3 cards from hand to reconcile your hand.

card.name: Defiance
card.property: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Nazgul).

card.name: Elrond
card.property: To play, spot Aragorn or an Elf. At the start of each turn, you may exert Elrond to heal a character bearing an artifact.

card.name: Hope Comes
card.property: To play, spot 2 Elves. Response: If an [Elven] skirmish event is played, discard this condition to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Into the West
card.property: Regroup: Exert an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [Elven] card, remove 3 threats. Place the revealed card beneath your draw deck.

card.name: Leaving Forever
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a condition or draw 2 cards.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Archery: If you have initiative, discard 4 cards from hand to wound a minion.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Archery: If you cannot spot a threat, add a threat to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Mirkwood Bowman
card.property: Exert 2 [Elven] companions to discard the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Make the fellowship archery total +1 for each [Elven] card discarded.

card.name: Shadow Between
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of your regroup phase, you may discard this condition or a card from hand to heal an Elf.

card.name: Still Needed
card.property: Make an Elf strength +2. You may place this event on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Uncertain Paths
card.property: Make an Elf strength +2 and you may shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: All Save One
card.property: Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 and damage +1 if you have initiative).

card.name: The Board Is Set
card.property: Spell. If an event is played, exert Gandalf to make that opponent remove (2) or cancel that event.

card.name: Citadel to Gate
card.property: Exert Gandalf twice to remove all threats and to heal all companions of one culture (except [Gandalf]).

card.name: Echoes of Valinor
card.property: Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may exert him to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Fool
card.property: Spot Gandalf and discard 2 cards from hand to make an opponent discard all but 2 Shadow conditions.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: While you cannot spot 3 companions of the same culture, Gandalf is strength -2.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Skirmish: Place 3 cards from hand on top of your draw deck to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -3. Any Shadow player may place 3 cards from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck to prevent this.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 4 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +1.

card.name: Glamdring
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Skirmish: If you have more cards in hand than each opponent, discard 2 cards from hand to make an opponent exert a minion.

card.name: Have Patience
card.property: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound companion twice.

card.name: Intimidate
card.property: Spell. If a companion is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf to prevent that wound.

card.name: King
card.property: Exert Gandalf twice to make an opponent exert a minion for each [Rohan] companion you spot.

card.name: Light the Beacons
card.property: Exert Gandalf three times (or twice if you have initiative) to make all unbound companions of one culture (except [Gandalf]) strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Moment of Respite
card.property: At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard 2 cards from hand to heal Gandalf.

card.name: Numenor
card.property: To play, spot Gandalf and add 3 threats. Gandalf is defender +1 and cannot take wounds. Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Peace of Mind
card.property: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound Hobbit 3 times.

card.name: Sharpen Your Swords
card.property: Spot Gandalf to make a [Gondor] companion strength +1 for each [Gondor] companion you spot (limit +4).

card.name: Stay This Madness
card.property: To play, spot Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to wound 2 minions.

card.name: Steadfast Champion
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Gandalf.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and heal a companion 3 times.

card.name: Terrible and Evil
card.property: Spell. Exert Gandalf X times to wound a minion X times. If that minion is a Nazgul, wound it again.

card.name: Undaunted
card.property: Exert Gandalf to make him strength +1 for each twilight token you spot (limit +8).

card.name: Wizard Staff
card.property: Bearer must be a Wizard. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a minion strength -3.

card.name: Captured by the Ring
card.property: Play Gollum from your draw deck or discard pile to add a threat.

card.name: Clever Hobbits
card.property: Discard any number of [Gollum] conditions. For each condition discarded, make Smeagol strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Days Growing Dark
card.property: Fellowship: Discard 3 cards from hand to play Smeagol from your discard pile.

card.name: The Dead City
card.property: Stealth. Bearer must be Smeagol. If Smeagol is about to be killed in a skirmish, he is discarded instead.

card.name: Fat One Wants It
card.property: Each time Gollum or Smeagol is played, add a threat. Regroup: Discard this condition to return Gollum to his owner's hand.

card.name: Gollum
card.property: If you have initiative during the Shadow phase, you may play this minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Gollum
card.property: Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice or remove a threat to make him strength +2.

card.name: Heavy Burden
card.property: Regroup: Discard Gollum and remove a threat to add a burden.

card.name: Hobbitses Are Dead
card.property: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to make a Nazgul, [Sauron] minion, or [Gollum] minion strength +2. If you have initiative, you may play this event from your discard pile; place it under your draw deck instead of discarding it.

card.name: It
card.property: Shadow: Remove (1) and exert Gollum to discard the top card of your draw deck. If that card is a [Gollum] or [Wraith] card, take it into hand.

card.name: Let Her Deal With Them
card.property: To play, spot Gollum or Smeagol. Bearer must be a minion. Limit 1 per bearer. Bearer is damage +1. If you have initiative during the Shadow phase, you may play this condition from your discard pile.

card.name: Nasty
card.property: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each [Gollum] card you spot.

card.name: Never
card.property: To play, spot Smeagol. Regroup: Discard Smeagol to remove 2 threats.

card.name: No Safe Places
card.property: Exert Smeagol to reveal an opponent's hand. That opponent must discard a card from hand for each culture revealed.

card.name: Plotting
card.property: To play, spot Gollum and add up to 9 threats. Gollum is strength +2. Discard this condition and remove 9 threats at the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Scouting
card.property: To play, spot Smeagol. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Maneuver: Discard Smeagol to discard a minion. An opponent may exert a minion twice to prevent this.

card.name: Secret Paths
card.property: To play, spot Smeagol and add 2 threats. The move limit for this turn is +1. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: Serving the Precious
card.property: Discard Smeagol to play a companion from your discard pile.

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Assignment: Assign a minion to Smeagol and add 2 threats to exhaust that minion.

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from your hand. Smeagol cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.name: Sneaking
card.property: Stealth. Heal Smeagol (or cancel Smeagol's skirmish if he has more vitality than the minion or minions he is skirmishing).

card.name: So Polite
card.property: Play Gollum from your discard pile to add (1) for each threat you spot.

card.name: Sweeter Meats
card.property: If a minion is about to take a wound, spot Gollum to prevent that wound.

card.name: Very Nice Friends
card.property: Play Smeagol from your discard pile to play the fellowship's next site (replacing an opponent's site if necessary). If you do not move again this turn, discard your hand.

card.name: We Hates Them
card.property: Bearer must be Smeagol. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Smeagol.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and play a companion from your discard pile.

card.name: Where Shall We Go
card.property: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing twice.

card.name: Anduril
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. Discard any other weapon he bears. He is damage +1 and cannot bear other weapons. Fellowship or Regroup: If the fellowship is at any site 2 or any site 5, play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Anduril
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. Discard other weapons he bears. He is damage +1 and cannot bear other weapons. Fellowship or Regroup: If the fellowship is at any site 2 or any site 5, play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Anduril
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. If you cannot spot a threat, Aragorn is defender +1.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Knight. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add (2) to heal another [Gondor] companion.

card.name: Cirion
card.property: While you have only 4 or 5 cards in hand, Cirion is strength +2.

card.name: City of Men
card.property: Make a [Gondor] Man strength +2. If that Man is skirmishing a [Sauron] minion, discard that minion at the end of the skirmish.

card.name: Dagger Strike
card.property: Make a [Gondor] or [Shire] companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Denethor
card.property: Fellowship: Play a [Gondor] knight. That knight's twilight cost is -2. Each time a Shadow card adds a threat, add a burden. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden, add a threat.

card.name: Denethor
card.property: Denethor is strength +1 for each other [Gondor] Man you can spot (limit +4).

card.name: Derufin
card.property: Regroup: While you have exactly 5 cards in hand, you may exert Derufin to discard an engine, machine, or possession.

card.name: Dervorin
card.property: At the start of the regroup phase, if you have only 4 cards in hand, you may spot another [Gondor] Man to discard a minion.

card.name: Duty of Two
card.property: Add 3 threats to heal all [Gondor] companions.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Ranger. To play, spot a [Gondor] Man. Each time Faramir wins a skirmish involving a fierce minion, you may exert Faramir to discard that minion.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Ranger. Fellowship: Play a [Rohan] Man to heal Faramir. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make an unbound Hobbit strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to prevent all wounds to Faramir.

card.name: First Level
card.property: Fortification. Maneuver: Exert a [Gondor] Man or spot a knight to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion.

card.name: Footman
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Response: if bearer is about to be overwhelmed, discard a [Gondor] fortification or a card from hand to make bearer strength +2.

card.name: Gondor Bow
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. If bearer is a knight, he or she is strength +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer to wound a minion he or she is skirmishing if that minion bears a fortification.

card.name: Gondor Still Stands
card.property: To play, spot 3 [Gondor] companions. While no opponent controls a site, wound a minion at the start of each regroup phase. Regroup: Discard this condition to place a [Gondor] fortification from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Gondorian Captain
card.property: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a fortification to remove a threat.

card.name: Gondorian Merchant
card.property: Maneuver: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to make the site number of a minion +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Gondorian Sword
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to make bearer damage +1.

card.name: Great Gate
card.property: Make a [Gondor] companion strength +2 and, if you can spot 2 [Gondor] fortifications, exert a minion that companion is skirmishing.

card.name: Greatest Stronghold
card.property: Exert a [Gondor] Man and spot 3 fortifications to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.name: Guarded
card.property: To play, spot 3 [Gondor] Men. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion (or all roaming minions).

card.name: Hasty Repairs
card.property: To play, spot 3 [Gondor] Men. Regroup: While you have only 4 cards in hand, you may discard 2 cards from hand to play a [Gondor] fortification from your discard pile.

card.name: Hearts Raised
card.property: At the start of your regroup phase, you may spot a [Gondor] Man and discard a card from hand to remove a threat.

card.name: Hidden Knowledge
card.property: Spot a [Gondor] companion to reveal the top 5 cards of an opponent's draw deck. For each Shadow card revealed, add a threat. For each Free Peoples card revealed, place a [Gondor] token on one of your conditions with a [Gondor] token on it. Shuffle that draw deck.

card.name: I Will Go
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. If you have initiative, bearer is defender +1.

card.name: Ingold
card.property: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a fortification to heal Ingold twice.

card.name: Iorlas
card.property: Response: If a possession or engine is played by your opponent, remove a [Gondor] token from your condition to make that opponent remove (1). If he or she cannot, discard that possession or engine.

card.name: Knight
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Skirmish: If you cannot spot 2 threats, add a threat to make bearer strength +1.

card.name: Long Prepared
card.property: To play, add 2 threats. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man to wound a roaming minion that Man is skirmishing. Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Madril
card.property: Ranger. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a roaming minion Madril is skirmishing.

card.name: Man the Walls
card.property: The site number of each minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man is +1.

card.name: Noble Leaders
card.property: When you play this condition, place a [Gondor] token here for each of the following characters you can spot: Aragorn, Boromir, Denethor or Faramir. Skirmish: Remove a token from here or discard this condition to make a [Gondor] companion strength +1 and damage +1.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Bearer must be Pippin. While you can spot 3 [Gondor] Men, Pippin may take no more than 1 wound in a skirmish.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Bearer must be Pippin. Skirmish: Exert Pippin twice to make him strength +1 for each [Gondor] companion you spot.

card.name: Ranger of Minas Tirith
card.property: Ranger. While skirmishing a roaming minion, this companion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Ranger of Osgiliath
card.property: Ranger. Regroup: Discard 2 cards from hand to exhaust a minion.

card.name: Reckless Counter
card.property: Spot 2 knights or exert 2 [Gondor] Men to liberate a site or discard any number of cards from hand.

card.name: Second Level
card.property: Fortification. Maneuver: Exert a [Gondor] Man or spot a ranger to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion.

card.name: Seventh Level
card.property: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert 3 [Gondor] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man.

card.name: Stand to Arms
card.property: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a roaming minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man twice.

card.name: Stout Resistance
card.property: Add a threat to make a [Gondor] Man strength +3.

card.name: Strong and Old
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Gondor] Men. The twilight cost of each of your [Gondor] fortifications is -1. Response: If an opponent is about to control a site, discard 2 [Gondor] fortifications to prevent this.

card.name: Support of the City
card.property: Fellowship: Play a [Gondor] Man to place a [Gondor] token here. Fellowship: Play a [Gondor] companion. That companion's twilight cost is -1 for each token here. Discard this condition.

card.name: Targon
card.property: Ranger. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a Man Targon is skirmishing.

card.name: Third Level
card.property: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man or spot 2 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man.

card.name: Unexpected Visitor
card.property: Bearer must be an [Gondor] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Unexpected Visitor.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and remove (4).

card.name: Vorondil
card.property: While no opponent controls a site, Vorondil is strength +2. Regroup: Exert 3 [Gondor] Men or 2 knights to liberate a site.

card.name: While We Yet Live
card.property: Make a roaming minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man strength -3.

card.name: Bold Men and Grim
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Raider] Men and add a threat. Each time a companion is about to be killed, you may remove a threat to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Dark Tidings
card.property: Regroup: Spot 2 [Raider] Men and remove (3) to add a threat (limit 1).

card.name: Desert Fighter
card.property: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove (1) to add a threat.

card.name: Desert Nomad
card.property: Southron. While you can spot 2 threats, this minion is damage +1.

card.name: Desert Runner
card.property: Southron. Ambush (1). When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

card.name: Desert Scout
card.property: Southron. Ambush (1). When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

card.name: Desert Sneak
card.property: Southron. Ambush (1). When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

card.name: Desert Soldier
card.property: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove (3) to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.name: Desert Spearman
card.property: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove (3) to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.name: Desert Villain
card.property: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove (1) to add a threat.

card.name: Easterling Aggressor
card.property: Easterling. Skirmish: If you have initiative or you spot 3 Easterlings, discard 2 cards from hand to heal another Easterling.

card.name: Easterling Assailant
card.property: Easterling. Skirmish: Remove a burden and exert this minion to heal another Easterling (or 2 Easterlings if you have initiative).

card.name: Easterling Attacker
card.property: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

card.name: Easterling Blademaster
card.property: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

card.name: Easterling Footman
card.property: Easterling. Maneuver: If you cannot spot 2 burdens, spot another Easterling and discard a card from hand to add a burden.

card.name: Easterling Ransacker
card.property: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

card.name: Easterling Regiment
card.property: Easterling. Fierce. Each time Easterling Regiment wins a skirmish, you may add (1) for each burden.

card.name: Easterling Sergeant
card.property: Easterling. Maneuver: If you cannot spot a burden, spot another Easterling and exert this minion to add a burden.

card.name: Easterling Veteran
card.property: Easterling. Skirmish: Remove 2 burdens to heal another Easterling.

card.name: Fierce in Despair
card.property: Spot 2 [Raider] Men to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Great Beasts
card.property: To play, spot a [Raider] Man. Regroup: Remove (9) and spot 3 [Raider] Men to make the move limit -1.

card.name: Harsh Tongues
card.property: To play, spot a [Raider] Man. Regroup: Remove (3) and spot a [Raider] Man to place a [Raider] token here. While there are 3 [Raider] tokens here, the Shadow has initiative regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: Hosts Still Unfought
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Raider] Men. Discard any number of cards from hand. The Free Peoples player then discards any number of cards from hand. For each card you discarded more than the Free Peoples player, add (1).

card.name: Mumak Commander
card.property: Southron. To play, spot a [Raider] Man. While you can spot 6 threats, each time this minion wins a skirmish, the companion he was skirmishing is killed.

card.name: Mumakil of the Harad
card.property: Spot a [Raider] minion to add (2) for each threat.

card.name: New Strength Came Now
card.property: Make a [Raider] Man strength +3 (or +6 if you have initiative).

card.name: Raider Bow
card.property: Bearer must be a [Raider] Man. Bearer is an archer and ambush (5).

card.name: Raider Halberd
card.property: Bearer must be a [Raider] Man. Skirmish: Exert bearer to add (2).

card.name: Red Wrath
card.property: Exert a [Raider] Man to wound a companion he is skirmishing twice.

card.name: Rout
card.property: To play, spot a [Raider] Man. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert 2 companions if you have initiative.

card.name: Small Hope
card.property: Maneuver: If you cannot spot 2 burdens, exert an Easterling to add a burden. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an Easterling strength +2.

card.name: Southron Bandit
card.property: Southron. Maneuver: Exert this minion to add (5). The Free Peoples player may add a threat to prevent this.

card.name: Southron Brigand
card.property: Southron. Shadow: Remove (3) and spot 3 [Raider] Men to make one of those Men damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Southron Captain
card.property: Southron. While you can spot 4 threats, this minion is damage +2.

card.name: Southron Chieftain
card.property: Southron. To play, spot a [Raider] Man. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character, the Shadow has initiative until the end of the turn.

card.name: Southron Conqueror
card.property: Southron. Archer. While you can spot 6 twilight tokens, other [Raider] Men are damage +1. While you can spot 9 twilight tokens, other [Raider] Men are damage +1.

card.name: Southron Intruder
card.property: Southron. Archer. While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, all [Raider] Men are strength +1. While you can spot 6 twilight tokens, all [Raider] Men are strength +1. While you can spot 9 twilight tokens, all [Raider] Men are strength +1.

card.name: Southron Leader
card.property: Southron. Archery: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and either exert this minion or remove a threat to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Southron Marksmen
card.property: Southron. Archer. Fierce. To play, spot a [Raider] Man. Archery: Exert this minion and remove a threat to make the minion archery total +1.

card.name: Southron Thief
card.property: Southron. Archery: Spot another [Raider] Man, spot 6 companions, and remove a threat to exert a companion.

card.name: Surging Up
card.property: Regroup: Exert an Easterling and discard this condition to make the move limit -1 for this turn. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this. Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal an Easterling.

card.name: Suzerain of Harad
card.property: Southron. Archer. While you have initiative, the Ring-bearer cannot take wounds during the archery phase and this minion is ambush (8).

card.name: Thrice Outnumbered
card.property: Spot a threat and X [Raider] Men to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions (limit 3).

card.name: Troop of Haradrim
card.property: Southron. While you can spot 2 threats, this minion is an archer. While you can spot 3 threats, this minion is fierce. While you can spot 4 threats, this minion is damage +1.

card.name: War Towers
card.property: Spot a [Raider] minion to add a threat. Add an additional threat for each companion over 4.

card.name: Called
card.property: Assignment: Remove 5 threats to assign a Nazgul to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). The Free Peoples player may discard that companion.

card.name: Corrupt
card.property: Make a Nazgul strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture you spot.

card.name: Disposable Servants
card.property: Spot a Nazgul to discard any number of cards from your hand. The Free Peoples player then discards any number of cards from his or her hand. For each card you discarded more than the Free Peoples player, add a threat.

card.name: Feel His Blade
card.property: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. During the turn this card is transferred, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: Foul Clutches
card.property: Discard 3 cards from hand to make a Nazgul strength +3.

card.name: Ghastly Host
card.property: Shadow: Spot a Nazgul and remove a threat to play a Nazgul. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Gorbag
card.property: While you can spot a Nazgul, Gorbag is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Held Ground
card.property: To play, spot 2 Nazgul and add up to 3 threats. Each time a companion is about to be killed, you may remove a threat to discard up to 2 possessions. Discard this condition and remove 3 threats during the regroup phase.

card.name: Loathsome
card.property: If a skirmish that involved a Nazgul is about to end, discard a possession borne by a companion in that skirmish.

card.name: Mind and Body
card.property: If a Nazgul kills a character, wound each character bearing a [Wraith] condition.

card.name: More Unbearable
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Regroup: Discard a Nazgul to place a [Wraith] token on this card. While there are 3 [Wraith] tokens on this card, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: Morgul Answers
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Skirmish: Remove (3) and spot 3 Nazgul to discard a possession or condition borne by a companion a Nazgul is skirmishing.

card.name: Morgul Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Wraith] Orc. While you can spot 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Morgul Brawler
card.property: While the Ring-bearer is exhausted, this minion is strength +3, fierce and damage +1.

card.name: Morgul Brute
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot a Nazgul to add a burden. The Free Peoples player may wound the Ring-bearer to prevent this. Skirmish: Remove a burden to make this minion strength +3.

card.name: Morgul Cur
card.property: While you can spot a Nazgul, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: Morgul Destroyer
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot a Nazgul to add 2 threats. The Free Peoples player may wound the Ring-bearer to prevent this. Skirmish: Remove a threat to make this minion strength +3.

card.name: Morgul Detachment
card.property: While you can spot a Nazgul, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.name: Morgul Hound
card.property: While you can spot 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, this minion is strength +4 and fierce.

card.name: Morgul Lackey
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a Nazgul or [Wraith] Orc strength +1.

card.name: Morgul Mongrel
card.property: While you can spot 3 wounds on the Ring-bearer, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.name: Morgul on the March
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Each time the Free Peoples player draws a card (except during the regroup phase), add a threat. Regroup: Discard a Nazgul and this condition to add a threat.

card.name: Morgul Predator
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a Nazgul or [Wraith] Orc strength +1.

card.name: Morgul Regiment
card.property: For each Nazgul you can spot, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion to assign this minion to a skirmish. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a Nazgul or [Wraith] Orc strength +1.

card.name: Morgul Ruffian
card.property: While you can spot a Nazgul, this minion may only take wounds during skirmish phases.

card.name: Morgul Soldier
card.property: Nazgul are strength +1.

card.name: Morgul Spawn
card.property: While you can spot a Nazgul, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion to assign this minion to a skirmish.

card.name: Morgul Spearman
card.property: While you can spot a Nazgul, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion to assign this minion to a skirmish.

card.name: Morgul Whelp
card.property: While you can spot a wound on the Ring-bearer, this minion is strength +6.

card.name: Nazgul Scimitar
card.property: Bearer must be a [Wraith] minion. While you can spot 5 threats, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Out of Sight and Shot
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Each time a companion is played, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion. Shadow: Spot a Nazgul and discard this condition to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

card.name: Put Forth His Strength
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Shadow: If you have initiative and there are 3 characters in the dead pile, spot 3 burdens, 3 threats and a Nazgul to corrupt the Ring-bearer.

card.name: Stronghold of Minas Morgul
card.property: Response: If your [Wraith] minion wins a skirmish, place a [Wraith] token here (limit 1 per site). Regroup: Spot 3 [Wraith] tokens here to exhaust the Ring-bearer. Discard this condition.

card.name: Their Power Is in Terror
card.property: Exert a Nazgul to wound each ally.

card.name: There Came a Cry
card.property: Spot a Nazgul to add a threat (or 3 threats if you have initiative).

card.name: Too Late
card.property: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. Each time bearer exerts, add (1).

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Fierce. Shadow: If you have initiative, exert Ulaire Attea and spot another [Wraith] minion to add a burden.

card.name: Ulaire Cantea
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Cantea, add a threat for each companion over 4. Maneuver: Remove 2 threats and spot another [Wraith] minion to discard a possession.

card.name: Ulaire Cantea
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Cantea, add a threat for each companion over 4. Maneuver: Remove 2 threats and spot another [Wraith] minion to discard a possession.

card.name: Ulaire Enquea
card.property: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, Ulaire Enquea is damage +1. Each time a companion is killed, you may exert Ulaire Enquea to exert the Ring-bearer.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Ulaire Lemenya is strength +1 for each other [Wraith] minion you spot. While you can spot 3 [Wraith] minions Ulaire Lemenya is fierce. While you can spot 4 [Wraith] minions Ulaire Lemenya is damage +1.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Lemenya to discard a possession.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. Skirmish: Discard a [Wraith] minion to make Ulaire Nelya strength +2.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Nelya to exert each Ring-bound companion.

card.name: Ulaire Nertea
card.property: Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Nertea to add a burden.

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Otsea to make the Free Peoples player exert a Ring-bound companion twice or return and unbound companion to his or her hand.

card.name: Ulaire Toldea
card.property: Fierce. While you have initiative and can spot a Nazgul, Ulaire Toldea's twilight cost is -6.

card.name: War Long Planned
card.property: Make a [Wraith] Orc strength +2 (or +4 if you spot 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer).

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. When you play the Witch-King, you may remove a threat to take a [Wraith] card into hand from your discard pile. The Ring-bearer cannot take threat wounds.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. When you play The Witch-king, you may remove a threat to take a [Wraith] card into hand from your discard pile. The Ring-bearer cannot take threat wounds.

card.name: Deor
card.property: Villager. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard a card from hand to make a [Rohan] Man strength +1.

card.name: Death They Cried
card.property: Spot a mounted [Rohan] Man to exert a minion. That minion's owner may exert a companion and if he or she does so, you may exert a minion; repeat this until a player does not exert a character.

card.name: Elfhelm
card.property: Valiant. Skirmish: Exert Elfhelm to make him strength +1 for each uncontrolled plains site you can spot.

card.name: Elite Rider
card.property: When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a wounded minion, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Enraged Horseman
card.property: While you can spot another [Rohan] Man and this companion is skirmishing a wounded minion, this companion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a [Rohan] companion to take a [Rohan] possession or [Rohan] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a [Rohan] companion to take a [Rohan] possession or [Rohan] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Valiant. While skirmishing a mounted minion, Eowyn is strength +2. While skirmishing a fierce minion, Eowyn is strength +2.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Skirmish: Discard a possession borne by Eowyn to make her strength +2.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Bearer must be Eowyn. You may play this possession anytime you could play a skirmish event. When you play this possession, you may wound a minion Eowyn is skirmishing.

card.name: Fey He Seemed
card.property: Make a [Rohan] Man strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if skirmishing a wounded minion).

card.name: Firefoot
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. Regroup: If bearer is Eomer, exert him to discard a condition. Any Shadow player may remove (1) to prevent this.

card.name: Grimbold
card.property: Valiant. Skirmish: Replace the fellowship's site with your plains site of the same number to discard a card from hand.

card.name: Guarded Fastness
card.property: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to heal all [Rohan] allies.

card.name: Guthlaf
card.property: Skirmish: Discard a [Rohan] condition to make Guthlaf strength +1.

card.name: Herugrim
card.property: Bearer must be Theoden. He is damage +1. Response: If Theoden is about to take a wound and you cannot spot 3 threats, add 2 threats to prevent that wound.

card.name: His Golden Shield
card.property: Spot 3 [Rohan] Men to make an opponent remove (1) or place a random card from hand beneath his or her draw deck. Do this once for each card in that player's hand when you play this event.

card.name: Knights of His House
card.property: Choose an opponent. For each mounted companion you spot, that opponent must remove (1) or place a random card from hand beneath his or her draw deck.

card.name: Leowyn
card.property: Villager. Fellowship: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to heal a [Rohan] Man.

card.name: Long Spear
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. You may add a threat to play this possession anytime you could play a skirmish event.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Bearer must be Merry. While you can spot 3 [Rohan] Men, Merry cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Bearer must be Merry. Maneuver: Exert Merry twice to exert a minion once for each [Rohan] companion you spot.

card.name: Morning Came
card.property: Make a [Rohan] Man strength +4. Any Shadow player may place a random card from hand beneath his or her draw deck to make that Man strength +2 instead.

card.name: Mustering for Battle
card.property: To play, spot 3 [Rohan] Men. Maneuver: Exert a [Rohan] companion twice or discard this condition to play a [Rohan] possession from your discard pile.

card.name: Riding Armor
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Response: If you have initiative and bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 3 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: Rohirrim Guard
card.property: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to exert a minion skirmishing this companion.

card.name: Rohirrim Herdsman
card.property: Villager. To play, spot 2 [Rohan] Men. Regroup: Discard 3 cards from hand to remove a threat.

card.name: Rohirrim Javelin
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Archery: Discard this possession to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Seeking New Foes
card.property: Skirmishes are resolved in an order decided by the first Shadow player. Each time a [Rohan] Man wins a skirmish, place a [Rohan] token here. Each [Rohan] Man is strength +1 for each token here. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: Snowmane
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. Regroup: If bearer is Theoden, exert him to liberate a site. Any Shadow player may remove (2) to prevent this.

card.name: Stern People
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Rohan] Men. Regroup: Discard cards from hand equal to the number of cards in an opponent's hand to make the move limit +1 for this turn. Each Shadow player may take up to 4 cards into hand from his or her discard pile. Discard this condition.

card.name: Strong Arms
card.property: To play, spot a [Rohan] Man. Plays on a site. This site is a plains. Each [Rohan] Man is strength +1 at this site.

card.name: Swift Steed
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. While at a plains site, bearer takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Theoden's twilight cost is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, you may exert a [Rohan] companion to exert a minion.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Theoden's twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, play a [Rohan] possession on Theoden and add (2) to heal another [Rohan] companion.

card.name: They Sang as They Slew
card.property: Exert X mounted companions to wound X minions.

card.name: Veteran Horseman
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this companion to make him strength +1 for each mounted companion you spot.

card.name: White Hot Fury
card.property: Make a mounted [Rohan] Man strength +1 for each mounted companion. If that Man is skirmishing a [Raider] minion, also make him or her strength +2 and damage +2.

card.name: Wind in His Face
card.property: Make a [Rohan] Man strength +2. If that Man is mounted, choose an opponent who must place a random card from hand beneath his or her draw deck.

card.name: Windfola
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. Skirmish: If bearer is Eowyn, exert her twice to wound a fierce minion she is skirmishing.

card.name: With Strength to Fight
card.property: To play, spot a [Rohan] companion. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to heal up to 2 [Rohan] companions.

card.name: Above the Battlement
card.property: Play a bieseger stacked on a site you control or remove a burden to play a [Sauron] Orc from your discard pile.

card.name: Anguish
card.property: Remove 3 threats to make a character skirmishing a [Sauron] Orc strength -3.

card.name: Army of Udun
card.property: Shadow: Discard a [Sauron] Orc to add a threat. Skirmish: Remove a threat to make Army of Udun strength +1. Regroup: Discard Army of Udun and X other [Sauron] Orcs to add X threats.

card.name: Besieging Pike
card.property: Bearer must be a [Sauron] Orc. If you have initiative, bearer is strength +3.

card.name: Breached
card.property: Remove 4 threats and spot 2 [Sauron] Orcs to make the Free Peoples player spot a companion and place that companion in the dead pile.

card.name: Din of Arms
card.property: Choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her draw deck. If the twilight cost of that card is less than the number of besiegers you spot, take control of a site and all besiegers are strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Encirclement
card.property: For each 2 sites you control, the twilight cost of each of your [Sauron] cards is -1. Regroup: Spot a [Sauron] minion to draw a card (or draw 2 cards instead if that minion is a besieger). Discard this condition.

card.name: Fires Raged Unchecked
card.property: The site number of each [Sauron] Orc is -1 for each threat. While you can spot 3 threats, each [Sauron] Orc that is not roaming is strength +1

card.name: Gorgoroth Attacker
card.property: Besieger. When you play this minion from a site you control, add a burden for each site you control.

card.name: Gorgoroth Axeman
card.property: Besieger. Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a [Sauron] minion strength +1 for each site you control (or +2 if you have initiative).

card.name: Gorgoroth Engineer
card.property: Besieger. When you play this minion from a site you control, add 2 threats.

card.name: Gorgoroth Garrison
card.property: Besieger. Regroup: Discard 2 cards from hand to stack a [Sauron] Orc on a site you control (or discard 1 card from hand if that Orc is a besieger).

card.name: Gorgoroth Officer
card.property: Besieger. Skirmish: Discard 2 cards from hand to play a [Sauron] Orc stacked on a site you control. That Orc is fierce and strength +6 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Gorgoroth Pillager
card.property: Besieger. While this minion is stacked on a site you control, besiegers are fierce.

card.name: Gorgoroth Ransacker
card.property: Besieger. Skirmish: If this minion is stacked on a site you control, discard him to make a [Sauron] Orc strength +5 (or +10 if you have initiative).

card.name: Gorgoroth Sapper
card.property: Besieger. Shadow: Discard 2 cards from hand to play a [Sauron] Orc stacked on a site you control (discard 1 card from hand instead if that Orc is a besieger).

card.name: Gorgoroth Soldier
card.property: Besieger. Response: If a besieger is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent it.

card.name: Gorgoroth Troop
card.property: Besieger. Skirmish: Stack your besieger on a site you control to make Gorgoroth Troop strength +2.

card.name: Great Peril of Fire
card.property: To play, spot a besieger or a site you control. Maneuver: Discard an engine to discard a condition from the Free Peoples support area.

card.name: Great Siege-towers
card.property: Engine. Shadow: Play a besieger to place a [Sauron] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [Sauron] token from a condition to make a [Sauron] Orc strength +1 (limit +2).

card.name: Host of Udun
card.property: When you play Host of Udun, you may remove X threats to make its twilight cost -X.

card.name: Legions of Morgul
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Sauron] Orcs and add up to 3 threats. Each time a companion is about to be killed, you may remove a threat to make all minions fierce until the regroup phase. Discard this condition and remove 3 threats at the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Mordor Assassin
card.property: Response: If a companion is overwhelmed during a skirmish involving a [Sauron] Orc and threat wounds are about to be placed, remove a threat to assign this minion to the Ring-bearer (even if the Ring-bearer is already assigned).

card.name: Mordor Defender
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion and spot another [Sauron] minion to add a threat.

card.name: Mordor Fighter
card.property: While you can spot a threat and another [Sauron] Orc, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: Mordor Guard
card.property: Skirmish: Exert 3 [Sauron] Orcs to add 3 threats. When this minion is discarded, remove 3 threats.

card.name: Mordor Regular
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion and spot another [Sauron] minion to add a threat.

card.name: Mordor Savage
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion and spot another [Sauron] minion to add a threat.

card.name: Mordor Soldier
card.property: Skirmish: Remove a threat to make this minion strength +4.

card.name: Mordor Trooper
card.property: Skirmish: Remove 2 threats to make a [Sauron] Orc strength +6.

card.name: Mordor Veteran
card.property: Skirmish: Remove 3 threats to make a [Sauron] minion strength +8.

card.name: Mordor Warrior
card.property: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make a companion skirmishing this minion strength -1 for each other [Sauron] Orc you spot (limit -3).

card.name: Orc Archer Troop
card.property: Archer. If you have initiative, the minion archery total is +1 and Orc Archer Troop is fierce.

card.name: Orc Assault Band
card.property: Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and exert this minion to make another [Sauron] Orc strength +6.

card.name: Orc Brood
card.property: Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to make this minion strength +3.

card.name: Orc Butcher
card.property: For each [Sauron] condition you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.name: Orc Chaser
card.property: Tracker. The site number of each [Sauron] Orc is -1. While you have initiative, this minion is strength +6.

card.name: Orc Destroyer
card.property: Shadow: Remove (3) and spot 3 [Sauron] Orcs to draw a card.

card.name: Orc Fanatic
card.property: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make another [Sauron] Orc strength +3.

card.name: Orc Marauder
card.property: While you can spot 3 other [Sauron] Orcs, this minion is strength +5.

card.name: Orc Officer
card.property: Each time a companion is overwhelmed in a skirmish that involves a [Sauron] Orc, add 3 burdens.

card.name: Orc Pursuer
card.property: Tracker. The site number of each [Sauron] Orc is -1. While you have initiative, this minion is strength +5.

card.name: Orc Rager
card.property: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make another [Sauron] Orc strength +4.

card.name: Orc Savage
card.property: While you can spot 6 companions and another [Sauron] Orc, this minion is strength +9 and fierce.

card.name: Orc Seeker
card.property: Tracker. The site number of each [Sauron] Orc is -1. If you have initiative when you play this minion, you may spot another [Sauron] Orc to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Orc Stalker
card.property: Tracker. The site number of each [Sauron] Orc is -1. While you have initiative, this minion is strength +8.

card.name: Rally the Host
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Sauron] Orcs. Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] Orc and remove a threat to shuffle a [Sauron] Orc from play into your draw deck.

card.name: Rope and Winch
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Sauron] Orcs. Discard any number of cards from hand. The Free Peoples player then discards any number of cards from hand. For each card you discarded more than the Free Peoples player, make a [Sauron] Orc strength +2.

card.name: Sauron
card.property: To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Shadow: Remove a threat to play a [Sauron] Orc without paying any roaming penalty. Regroup: Spot a [Sauron] Orc and remove (4) to add a threat.

card.name: Siege Commander
card.property: Besieger. Skirmish: Discard 2 cards from hand to make a besieger fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Siegecraft
card.property: If your [Sauron] Orc wins a skirmish, make all your [Sauron] Orc fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Some Secret Art of Flame
card.property: To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Regroup: Play a [Sauron] condition to place a [Sauron] token on this card. While there are 3 tokens on this card, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: Stronghold of Cirith Ungol
card.property: Response: If your [Sauron] minion wins a skirmish, place a [Sauron] token here (limit 1 per site). Regroup: Add (2) for each token here. Discard this condition.

card.name: Tower Walkway
card.property: Engine. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Each besieger is strength +1 for each site you control. Regroup: Discard 3 [Sauron] Orcs to take control of a site. Discard this condition.

card.name: Troop Tower
card.property: Engine. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. All [Sauron] Orcs are strength +1 for each besieger stacked on a site. Regroup: Discard a besieger to take control of a site. Discard this condition.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Ring-bound. Each time the fellowship moves, you may add (3) to remove a threat.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Ring-bound. Skirmish: At sites 6K to 8K, add 4 burdens to wound a minion skirmishing Frodo.

card.name: Hobbit Sword
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Skirmish: If you cannot spot 3 threats, add a threat to make Merry strength +2.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, return him to your hand to play up to 2 [Rohan] possessions from your discard pile.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, return him to your hand to play up to 2 [Rohan] possessions from your discard pile.

card.name: Noble Intentions
card.property: Exert a companion (except a Hobbit) to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: While you cannot spot 4 threats, Pippin is strength +1 for each threat you can spot.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, return him to your hand to wound a roaming minion twice.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, return him to your hand to wound a roaming minion twice.

card.name: Pressing On
card.property: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition and exert a Hobbit companion to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Sam
card.property: Ring-bound. Fellowship: Play a Hobbit companion to remove a burden. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: Sam
card.property: Ring-bound. Fellowship: If you have initiative, discard a card from hand to heal Sam. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: Slow-kindled Courage
card.property: Bearer must be Merry or Pippin. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Slow-kindled Courage.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and remove 2 burdens.

card.name: Dunharrow Plateau
card.property: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to play a [Dwarven] condition from your draw deck (limit once per turn).

card.name: Edoras Hall
card.property: The twilight cost of each [Rohan] possession is -1.

card.name: Isengard Ruined
card.property: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to add (2). Each player may draw a card.

card.name: Rohirrim Road
card.property: Fellowship: Exert an Elf to make the twilight cost of each condition and possession +2 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Sleeping Quarters
card.property: When the fellowship moves from this site, the Free Peoples player may spot 3 Hobbits to remove (2).

card.name: Steps of Edoras
card.property: Each [Gondor] companion is defender +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: King
card.property: Shadow: If the Shadow has initiative, spot your minion to make the move limit for this turn -1.

card.name: Rohirrim Camp
card.property: Plains. If the Shadow has initiative, minions are not roaming.

card.name: West Road
card.property: Plains. If the Shadow has initiative, the Shadow number of this site is +3.

card.name: Beacon of Minas Tirith
card.property: Sanctuary. Fellowship: If you cannot spot 3 threats, add a threat to heal a companion.

card.name: Hall of the Kings
card.property: Sanctuary. Fellowship: If you cannot spot 3 threats, add a threat to draw a card.

card.name: Tower of Ecthelion
card.property: Sanctuary. Fellowship: If you cannot spot 3 threats, add 3 threats to make the move limit for this turn +1.

card.name: Anduin Banks
card.property: River. Skirmish: Spot your minion and remove a burden to make that minion strength +2.

card.name: Osgiliath Fallen
card.property: Skirmish: Spot your minion and remove 2 burdens to make that minion damage +1.

card.name: Pelennor Plain
card.property: Plains. Archery: Spot your minion and remove 3 burdens to make the minion archery total +3.

card.name: City Gates
card.property: When the fellowship moves to this site, add 3 threats. When the fellowship moves from this site, remove 3 threats.

card.name: Pelennor Flat
card.property: Plains. At the start of the maneuver phase, the Free Peoples player must discard his or her hand or add 2 burdens.

card.name: Minas Tirith Fifth Circle
card.property: Sanctuary. If the fellowship moves from this site during the regroup phase, heal Gandalf three times.

card.name: Minas Tirith First Circle
card.property: Sanctuary. If the fellowship moves from this site during the regroup phase, wound each companion.

card.name: Minas Tirith Fourth Circle
card.property: Sanctuary. If the fellowship moves from this site during the regroup phase, heal each [Rohan] companion.

card.name: Minas Tirith Second Circle
card.property: Sanctuary. If the fellowship moves from this site during the regroup phase, heal each [Dwarven] companion.

card.name: Minas Tirith Seventh Circle
card.property: Sanctuary. If the fellowship moves from this site during the regroup phase, heal each [Elven] companion.

card.name: Minas Tirith Sixth Circle
card.property: Sanctuary. If the fellowship moves from this site during the regroup phase, heal each [Gondor] companion.

card.name: Minas Tirith Third Circle
card.property: Sanctuary. If the fellowship moves from this site during the regroup phase, heal each Hobbit companion.

card.name: Osgiliath Crossing
card.property: River. Shadow: Exert 2 minions and spot 6 companions to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Pelennor Grassland
card.property: Plains. Shadow: Exert a minion and spot 6 companions to add (1).

card.name: Ruined Capitol
card.property: River. Shadow: Spot your minion and 6 companions to make the move limit for this turn -1.

card.name: Cross Roads
card.property: Shadow: Spot 2 [Raider] Men and remove a threat to add (2).

card.name: Morgul Vale
card.property: Skirmish: Spot your [Sauron] minion and remove 2 threats to make your [Sauron] minion strength +3.

card.name: Morgulduin
card.property: Shadow: Remove 2 threats to play a Nazgul from your discard pile. His twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Northern Ithilien
card.property: Shadow: Remove 2 threats and play Gollum from your discard pile to add 2 burdens.

card.name: Dagorlad
card.property: Plains. When the fellowship moves to this site, add 3 threats.

card.name: Haunted Pass
card.property: Shadow: Remove a threat and spot your minion to draw a card.

card.name: Narchost
card.property: Shadow: Spot 8 burdens to make the Ring-bearer wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.name: Slag Mounds
card.property: Each time a companion is killed, add a burden.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: While you cannot spot 4 threats, Aragorn is strength +1 for each threat. Regroup: Exert Aragorn twice to remove 3 threats.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish:If you have initiative, discard 3 cards from hand to make Eomer strength +1 for each valiant companion you spot.
